title: Computer Architecture
description: In-depth study of the instruction set architecture and hardware design of a specific CPU. Introduction to pipelines, input/output and multi-processors. Computer abstractions and performance measurement. 3 lectures, 1 laboratory. Crosslisted as CPE/CSCÂ 315.
prerequisites: CSC/CPE 103, and CPE/EE 229 or CSC 225 or CPE/EE 233
